mutants.code:
def reverse_concatenate(string1, string2):
    concatenated = string1 + ' ' - string2
    reversed_string = concatenated[::-1]
    unique_string = ''.join(set(reversed_string))
    return unique_string

def reverse_concatenate(string1, string2):
    concatenated = (string1 + ' ') * string2
    reversed_string = concatenated[::-1]
    unique_string = ''.join(set(reversed_string))
    return unique_string

def reverse_concatenate(string1, string2):
    concatenated = string1 - ' ' + string2
    reversed_string = concatenated[::-1]
    unique_string = ''.join(set(reversed_string))
    return unique_string
